short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet Miko the virtual pet dog. Every time you open a new tab, Miko eats and stays healthy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Miko, your new browser's virtual pet dog.
Every time you open a new tab, Miko eats and their health bar rises. When time passes, Miko gets hungry and their health bar decreases. Keep opening new tabs to make your pet healthy. Don’t let them starve!


By clicking “Add to chrome”, I accept and agree to installing the "Miko New Tab" extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Bing.

Terms and Conditions: https://ekpnetwork.com/miko-terms
Privacy Policy: https://ekpnetwork.com/privacy-policy
Contact: https://ekpnetwork.com/contact-us
About Us:  https://ekpnetwork.com/about-us
